text:
some notion of a 'base prefix' would be great, i.e., <zip .... 
prefix="myproduct-3.2" .../> would include all the zipfilesets inside, 
prefixing all zipfileset prefixes with the given value. This would allow easy 
creation of zip files with a base directory without having to include 
a '${base_zip_prefix}' in each prefix field of each zipfileset.

-sam
